properties.IndicatorDesc: Proportion and number of children aged 5?17 years engaged in child labour, by sex and age
properties.SERIES_Desc: Number of children aged 5-17 years engaged in hazardous work
properties.FOOTNOTES: Children in hazardous work refer to children in any activity or occupation that, by its nature or type, has or leads to adverse effects on the their safety, health and moral development. It is a subcategory of child labour.
properties.SOURCE_DETAIL: MENA - refers to Middle East and Northern Africa. Data for the regional groupings established for the purposes of SDG reporting are not available for this indicator. ILO regional groupings are used instead.
